original_text: And it shall come to pass, that ye shall divide it by lot for an inheritance unto you, and to the strangers that sojourn among you, which shall beget children among you: and they shall be unto you as born in the country among the children of Israel; they shall have inheritance with you among the tribes of Israel.
korean_text: 너희는 이 땅을 나누되 제비 뽑아 너희와 너희 가운데에 머물러 사는 타국인 곧 너희 가운데에서 자녀를 낳은 자의 기업이 되게 할지니 너희는 그 타국인을 본토에서 난 이스라엘 족속 같이 여기고 그들도 이스라엘 지파 중에서 너희와 함께 기업을 얻게 하되

sentences.original_text: And it shall come to pass
that ye shall divide it by lot
and to the strangers that sojourn among you
which shall beget children among you
and they shall be unto you

sentences.korean_translation: 그 땅에서 난 자와 같이 되리라

sentences.original_text: they shall have inheritance with you
